name: ColorIt Dash
description:
A classic style endless runner with your main goal being not to die while collecting as many gems as possible. Tap a button to transform your character to give them a wide variety of powers, and to use them to your advantage. Test your reflexes by avoiding various stage hazards while attempting to get the gems scattered across them.

Main features:

- Three varied transformations for your character

- Completely randomized stage each time

- Highscore system with achievable ranks

- Easy to learn and to play

- An endless amount of situations possible

Enjoy!
